segments.text: Can you take part in our picnic this Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be fine . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We plan to go to a forest in the suburb . There is a beautiful river there . We can do some fishing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And don't forget your fishing tackle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I like fishing very much .
segments.speaker: S2
